languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс изучающе рассматривает вас.{/n} "Кровь родословной может быть запятнана деяниями предков. Если это так, то тем более в твоих интересах сделать все, чтобы очистить свое имя — и после этого, возможно, у тебя будет шанс восстановить репутацию всей династии".

{n}Heinrix regards you with a probing look.{/n} "A bloodline can be stained by ancestral transgressions. If it is indeed so, it is in your best interests to do whatever necessary to redeem yourself — and then, perhaps, you will get a chance to salvage your dynasty's reputation."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс изучающе рассматривает вас.{/n} "Кровь родословной может быть запятнана деяниями предков. Если это так, то тем более в твоих интересах сделать все, чтобы очистить свое имя — и после этого, возможно, у тебя будет шанс восстановить репутацию всей династии".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix regards you with a studious look.{/n} "A bloodline can be stained by the ancestral transgressions. If it is indeed so, it is in your best interest to do everything to redeem yourself — and then, perhaps, you will get a chance to salvage the reputation of your entire dynasty."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix regards you with a studious look.{/n} "A bloodline can be stained by the ancestral transgressions. If it is indeed so, it is in your best interest to do everything to redeem yourself — and then, perhaps, you will get a chance to salvage the reputation of your entire dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix regards you with a probing look.{/n} "A bloodline can be stained by ancestral transgressions. If it is indeed so, it is in your best interests to do whatever necessary to redeem yourself — and then, perhaps, you will get a chance to salvage your dynasty's reputation."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te dedica una mirada larga y penetrante.{/n} «Un linaje puede estar mancillado por las transgresiones de los antepasados. Si es así, le convendría hacer todo lo necesario para redimirse. Tal vez así pueda reparar la reputación de su dinastía».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix regards you with a probing look.{/n} "A bloodline can be stained by ancestral transgressions. If it is indeed so, it is in your best interests to do whatever necessary to redeem yourself — and then, perhaps, you will get a chance to salvage your dynasty's reputation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te dedica una mirada larga y penetrante.{/n} «Un linaje puede estar mancillado por las transgresiones de los antepasados. Si es así, le convendría hacer todo lo necesario para redimirse. Tal vez así pueda reparar la reputación de su dinastía».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希以探询的目光看着你。{/n}“某个家族的血统可能会被祖先的过失所玷污。如果真的是这种情况，你应该做一切必要的事情来自我救赎，这才是最符合利益的选择。在这之后，你或许还会有机会挽回你的王朝的声誉。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix regards you with a probing look.{/n} "A bloodline can be stained by ancestral transgressions. If it is indeed so, it is in your best interests to do whatever necessary to redeem yourself — and then, perhaps, you will get a chance to salvage your dynasty's reputation."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希以探询的目光看着你。{/n}“某个家族的血统可能会被祖先的过失所玷污。如果真的是这种情况，你应该做一切必要的事情来自我救赎，这才是最符合利益的选择。在这之后，你或许还会有机会挽回你的王朝的声誉。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、こちらを探るように見つめる。{/n}「血統は先祖の罪で汚れることがある。そういうことなら、名誉挽回に必要なことは何でもするのが一番良いだろう。そうすればきっと、王朝の評判を回復するチャンスがやって来る」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix regards you with a probing look.{/n} "A bloodline can be stained by ancestral transgressions. If it is indeed so, it is in your best interests to do whatever necessary to redeem yourself — and then, perhaps, you will get a chance to salvage your dynasty's reputation."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、こちらを探るように見つめる。{/n}「血統は先祖の罪で汚れることがある。そういうことなら、名誉挽回に必要なことは何でもするのが一番良いだろう。そうすればきっと、王朝の評判を回復するチャンスがやって来る」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix begrüßt dich mit einem prüfenden Blick.{/n} "Eine Blutlinie kann durch die Verfehlungen ihrer Ahnen befleckt sein. Sollte dem tatsächlich so sein, wäre es in Eurem besten Interesse, Euch nach Kräften reinzuwaschen ... vielleicht bekommt ihr dann eine Chance, das Ansehen Eurer Dynastie wiederherzustellen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix regards you with a probing look.{/n} "A bloodline can be stained by ancestral transgressions. If it is indeed so, it is in your best interests to do whatever necessary to redeem yourself — and then, perhaps, you will get a chance to salvage your dynasty's reputation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix begrüßt dich mit einem prüfenden Blick.{/n} "Eine Blutlinie kann durch die Verfehlungen ihrer Ahnen befleckt sein. Sollte dem tatsächlich so sein, wäre es in Eurem besten Interesse, Euch nach Kräften reinzuwaschen ... vielleicht bekommt ihr dann eine Chance, das Ansehen Eurer Dynastie wiederherzustellen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard interrogateur.{/n} « Les transgressions des ancêtres peuvent entacher toute une lignée. Si tel est le cas, vous avez tout intérêt à faire le nécessaire pour vous racheter. Ainsi, peut-être, aurez-vous une chance de sauver la réputation de votre dynastie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix regards you with a probing look.{/n} "A bloodline can be stained by ancestral transgressions. If it is indeed so, it is in your best interests to do whatever necessary to redeem yourself — and then, perhaps, you will get a chance to salvage your dynasty's reputation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard interrogateur.{/n} « Les transgressions des ancêtres peuvent entacher toute une lignée. Si tel est le cas, vous avez tout intérêt à faire le nécessaire pour vous racheter. Ainsi, peut-être, aurez-vous une chance de sauver la réputation de votre dynastie. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sana irdeleyici bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Ataların gerçekleştirdiği bir suç nedeniyle soylar kirlenebilir. Durum gerçekten bu şekildeyse kendini affettirmek için ne gerekiyorsa yapman, faydana olacaktır. Belki o zaman hanedanlığının saygınlığını koruma şansın olabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix regards you with a probing look.{/n} "A bloodline can be stained by ancestral transgressions. If it is indeed so, it is in your best interests to do whatever necessary to redeem yourself — and then, perhaps, you will get a chance to salvage your dynasty's reputation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sana irdeleyici bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Ataların gerçekleştirdiği bir suç nedeniyle soylar kirlenebilir. Eğer durum gerçekten bu şekildeyse kendini affettirmek için ne gerekiyorsa yapman faydana. Belki o zaman hanedanlığının saygınlığını geri kazanma şansın olabilir."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
